channel.title: Softlayer_location_datacenter on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_location_datacenter on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter exposes functionality to access datacenter-specific portions of SoftLayer’s backend network. SoftLayer maintains datacenters within it’s location hierarchy. Datacenters are located in city locations and each contain server room locations, racks, then slots. Each slot location houses a piece of SoftLayer hardware. seeAlso SoftLayer_Location Methods getActiveItemPresaleEvents getActivePresaleEvents getAvailableObjectStorageDatacenters Get the datacenters where object storage is available getBackboneDependents getBackendHardwareRouters getBoundSubnets Retrieve subnets which are directly bound to one or more routers in a given datacenter, and currently allow routing.

item.title: Router Model Map
item.description: Prints out model numbers of networking equipment that is on route to your servers. Could be useful if merged with https://softlayer.github.io/python/networktopology/ """ @author Christopher Gallo Finds the model number of all networking equipment that is on the way to servers on the account. """ import SoftLayer from pprint import pprint as pp class networkMap(): def __init__(self): self.client = SoftLayer.Client() def main(self): """ Goes through each server, and prints out what networking hardware is upstream """ mask = "mask[id, fullyQualifiedDomainName]" servers = self.

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter extends the [[SoftLayer_Location]] data type to include datacenter-specific properties. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware::getDatacenter SoftLayer_Location::getDatacenters seeAlso SoftLayer_Location (type) Local euCompliantFlag Type: boolean id The unique identifier of a specific location. Type: integer longName A longer location description. Type: string name A short location description. Type: string statusId Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter extends the [[SoftLayer_Location]] data type to include datacenter-specific properties. Local euCompliantFlag Type: boolean id The unique identifier of a specific location. Type: integer longName A longer location description. Type: string name A short location description. Type: string statusId Type: integer Relational activeItemPresaleEvents Type: SoftLayer_Sales_Presale_Event[]

item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter::getAvailableObjectStorageDatacenters Overview Object Storage is only available in select datacenters. This method will return all the datacenters where object storage is available. item.title: getBrandCountryRestrictions
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter::getBrandCountryRestrictions Overview Retrieve this references relationship between brands, locations and countries associated with a user’s account that are ineligible when ordering products. For example, the India datacenter may not be available on this brand for customers that live in Great Britain. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Location_DatacenterInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Location_DatacenterObjectMask SoftLayer_Location_DatacenterObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Brand_Restriction_Location_CustomerCountry[]

item.title: getDatacenters
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter::getDatacenters Overview Retrieve all datacenter locations. SoftLayer’s datacenters exist in various cities and each contain one or more server rooms which house network and server infrastructure. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Location_DatacenterObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask SoftLayer_Location_DatacenterObjectFilter Return Values SoftLayer_Location[]

item.title: getStatisticsGraphImage
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Datacenter::getStatisticsGraphImage Overview Retrieve a graph of a SoftLayer datacenter’s last 48 hours of network activity. Statistics graphs show traffic outbound from a datacenter on top and inbound traffic on the bottom followed by a legend of the network services tracked in the graph. getStatisticsGraphImage returns a PNG image of variable width and height depending on the number of services reported in the image. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Location_DatacenterInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values binary data
